content: off needle in order to c omplete decrease then place marker after the completed decrease repeat from * to end of round 8 stitches decreased 80 stitches remain r epeat last decrease round until 8 stitches remain finishing break yarn leaving a 15 cm 6 in tail using a tapestry needle thread yarn tail through remaining live stitches and draw together to close the gap fasten_off weave in ends block to measurements copyright 2013 sharon matarazzo all rights reserved �2 of 2�
